# alis_google_spanner_database_iam_policy (Data Source)





## Example Usage

```terraform
data "alis_google_spanner_database_iam_policy" "policy" {
  project  = var.GOOGLE_PROJECT
  instance = var.SPANNER_INSTANCE
  database = "tf-test"
}
```
